column3: 2015 from 10:00 AM until 1:00 PM at Colonial Chapel Funeral Home of Laurel. Funeral services will be held at the funeral home at 2:00 PM. Burial will follow in Hickory Grove Cemetery in Laurel
column4: MS. Bro. Cliff Jenkins and Bro. Bob Bullock will officiate. Colonial Chapel Funeral Home of Laurel in charge of arrangements. (601)649-3342
